locations: Saville Row, Bath, 4 Saville Row, Bath BA1 2QP, UK::(Henry's Restaurant)
imdb.plot outline: Becca, a young waitress tries to save the charming restaurant she works at from her bombastic and cringe-worthy manager. As a restaurant critic arrives unannounced, Becca, accompanied by two charming chefs attempt to rescue the restaurant they sustain. However Malcolm, their walking nightmare of a manager is only too ready to intervene, as hell soon breaks loose.
imdb.title: Out of the Frying Pan
akas: Out of the Frying Pan (United Kingdom)
plot: Becca, a young waitress tries to save the charming restaurant she works at from her bombastic and cringe-worthy manager. As a restaurant critic arrives unannounced, Becca, accompanied by two charming chefs attempt to rescue the restaurant they sustain. However Malcolm, their walking nightmare of a manager is only too ready to intervene, as hell soon breaks loose.::Joseph Gardiner
